Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "Lists all the queues for the TAS system. Queues are used for sorting tasks of a similar nature. New tasks filed via the \\"assist\\" command are sorted into the NEW queue while tasks filed with the \\"bug\\" command are sorted into the BUGS queue, etc.\\r\\n\\r\\nQueues can contain sub-queues for easier sorting. Sub-queues are not shown on the queue list unless you shift your focus into the parent (top level) queue."

"+tas queue\\r\\n S/E/P/G/L/F/R \| Op/Cl \| Queue \| Description\\r\\n---------------+-------+----------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------\\r\\n * \| 181/0 \| Bugs \| Default queue for filed 'bug' tasks\\r\\n * * \| 39/0 \| Ce \|\\r\\n * \| 16/0 \| Changelog \| Recent Code and Command Changes\\r\\n * \| 306/0 \| Ideas \| Default queue for filed 'idea' tasks\\r\\n * \| 29/0 \| New \| Default queue for filed 'assist' tasks\\r\\n * \| 202/0 \| Socials \| Requests for VERB or ADVERB\\r\\n * \| 35/0 \| Suspended \|\\r\\n * * * \| 2/0 \| Tas \| All TAS requests, comments and bugs\\r\\n * \| 10/0 \| Typos \| Default queue for filed 'typo' tasks\\r\\n * * \| 0/0 \| Xcode \| All cross-game code (xcode) requests\\r\\n\\r\\nS: System, E: Email Alerted, P: Private, G: Contains SubQueues,\\r\\n"
